Experience

Software Engineering Intern, NCR Atlanta, GA May 2019 - Aug 2019
  • Enhanced the Emerald POS test suite with 7 automated test scripts written in C# using Selenium

  • Worked with a global team to certify the Emerald POS product release for Northgate
  • Installed and configured 3 VMs on servers located in Waterloo to enhance team productivity
Undergraduate Teaching Assistant Georgia Institute of Technology Aug 2019 - Present
Courses CS 2110 (Computer Organization and Architecture Current), CS 1301: Intro to Computing
  • Hold office hours to help students debug assembly code and challenging projects written in C
  • Conduct a weekly recitation for 50 students; proctor midterms, timed labs, and quizzes
  • Author and grade homework assignments, quizzes, and exams

Projects

  • hn

    Developed a HackerNews CLI in Rust. Displays the top 30 stories by manipulating the terminal tty in raw mode, supports save-for-later, and uses vim-style navigation to view stories. Available on homebrew.

  • emojic

    Created a tool that generates an emojified FFT visualization of an mp3 song on a browser. The tool transforms the lyrics into emoji, and then render 256 dancing emojis with little-to-no lag.

  • mapGT

    Built a fully-featured JavaScript SVG editor that allows HackGT members to create interactive maps on the fly. Authored a supporting library that provides developers with an API to create interactive experiences using the exported map. Engineered the editor to be a PWA.

Extracurriculars

HackGT Software Developer Dec 2018 - Present
  • Helped organize HackGT (a 1000+ participant hackathon), BuildGT, and Horizons
  • Mentored Atlanta high school students at Catalyst, a 200+ participant learnathon
  • Created mapGT; Programmed a calibration system for HackGT’s hackathon application review SlackBot that reduced application review time from weeks to 3-4 days.
  • Leading a team of 20 people and coordinating efforts across research labs and student orgs to host Horizons
Bits of Good Aug 2019 - Dec 2019
  • Developed a search engine that helps Medshare’s 20,000 volunteers in inventory management by replacing the old paper-based system.
